post.author: A-Yeon Chung
post.content:
VisaulAge for Java 3.5의 WebSphere Testing 툴에서 COM.ibm.jdbc.db2.appdriver로 Naming Service를 start시키면 다음 에러가 뜨는데, 도움 부탁드립니다.
제 환경은 NT4 (Service Pace6), DB2 EE 7.2 beta, Vaj Entry EE 3.5 (patch 2) 이고, Workspace classpath에 db2java.zip은 설정되어 있습니다.
[01.06.08 15:20:29:064 EDT] 3019 CreateNsTable W Failed to create tables
java.sql.SQLException: Error loading JDBC driver: COM.ibm.db2.jdbc.app.DB2Driver java.lang.Throwable(java.lang.String) java.lang.Exception(java.lang.String) java.sql.SQLException(java.lang.String) java.sql.Driver com.ibm.ejs.cm.JDBCDataSource.loadAndCheckDriver() com.ibm.ejs.cm.pool.ConnectionFactory
post.title: Error when connecting DB2 with VisualAge for Java
